#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main() {
	int t,i;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--) {
		stack<int> ss;
		string exp;
		cin>>exp;
		for(i=0;i<exp.size();i++) {
			if(i==0 && (exp[i]==')'||exp[i]=='}'||exp[i]==']')) {
				cout<<"no\n";break;
			}

		 if(exp[i]==')'||exp[i]=='}'||exp[i]==']') {
		 	char ch=exp[i];
				if((ch==')'&& ss.top()=='(') || (ch=='}'&& ss.top()=='{')|| (ch==']'&& ss.top()=='[')) 
					ss.pop();
				else {
					cout<<"no\n"; break;
				}
			}

			else if(exp[i]=='('||exp[i]=='{'||exp[i]=='[')
				ss.push(exp[i]);
		}

		if(ss.empty() and i!=0)
			cout<<"yes\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
